summary: Implements a custom Stable Diffusion pipeline that runs the same text‑to‑image generation across multiple diffusion schedulers (e.g., DDIM, PNDM, LMS) and returns the results for side‑by‑side comparison.
business_intent: Help developers and researchers quickly evaluate and compare the visual quality and performance of different diffusion schedulers within Stable Diffusion, aiding model selection and optimization decisions.
